$description: Core font weight primitives for typographic emphasis hierarchy.

light.$description: Light font weight (300). Use sparingly for: large display text.

regular.$description: Regular font weight (400). DEFAULT for all body text.

medium.$description: Medium font weight (500). Use for: subtle emphasis, navigation items.

semibold.$description: Semibold font weight (600). Use for: buttons, important labels.

bold.$description: Bold font weight (700). Use for: headings (h1-h3).
